physical_appearance: The image shows a set of four squeegees. They come in three different colours, namely blue, white, and green. The blue squeegee on the extreme left of the image has the word 'stop'  in bold letters stated near its top. The white squeegee towards the left of the centre of the image has the word 'water' in bold letters stated near its top. The blue squeegee towards the right of the centre of the image has the word 'fix' in bold letters stated near its top. The green squeegee on the extreme right of the image has the word 'selenium' stated near its top.
sgcool_label_text: Squeegees are used in handling photographic films during film processing. In this case, the squeegees were used during the different steps of the process. These are part of the darkroom photography equipment that was previously used by The Picture Farm, which was set up by the renowned photographer Willie Tang.
context_21: 45 Jalan Pemimpin, #09-00 Foo Wah Industrial Building, Thomson, Singapore
title_text: Film squeegees A set of film squeegees
subject_terms_1: photographic processing equipment tools implements (object genre)
context_20: The set of equipment was used by The Picture Farm Pte Ltd
